General.Name: Margun Enerji Uretim Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Margün Enerji Üretim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. develops and operates solar power plants with an installed power of 118.03 megawatt in Turkey. It also provides project development, engineering, construction, procurement, mechanical assembly, electrical work, switchyard installation, ETL construction, commissioning, and operation and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey. Margün Enerji Üretim Sanayi ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi is a subsidiary of Esenboga Elektrik Üretim A.S.
General.Address: ATM Plaza, No: 1 / 68 Blok, Kat: 4, Ankara, Turkey
